name: Cave Dive (RizingGamesUK)
description:
Description

A game about about exploring caves, collecting treasure, and avoiding enemies. Use your rope to swing from side to side and reach new, unexplored areas, and then descend downward into the unknown depths below. Will you achieve fame and fortune? Or will you suffer a similar fate to all of the other explorers that came before you?

Instructions:

Explore each level and find as much treasure as possible. Find the big treasure chest to complete a level.

Controls:

Left/Right arrows - Swing

Up/Down Arrows - Climb

Space - Push away from wall

Created by:

Henry Mitchell

Rizing Games  Cambridge Regional College
